description:
Do you have images you want to showcase on your website in a clean, responsive and attractive way but just don't know how to? Now you can! This course teaches you how to create stunning showcases to share your images with the world.

Images play a major role in how users interact with your website. The way you present images on your website will determine if people stay or leave. It's important that create something that allows you to upload unlimited images just by dragging and dropping in a professional way.

Features:

Multiple Image Sources

You can choose to show images from multiple sources

Multiple Gallery Themes

JSN ImageShow allows you to use various themes for the gallery

Multiple Presentation

Show image gallery by all means available in Joomla! components, modules and plugins, multiple galleries on single page

Drag-n-Drop Management

You can choose desired images from the album then drag them into the showlist

Mobile Ready

Special built-in responsive gallery optimized for modern mobile devices iPhone, iPad, Android and Windows mobile-based

Joomla! 3.x Support

JSN ImageShow is now compatible with Joomla! 3.x

You can also import images from multiple social platforms including:

  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • Joom Gallery
  • Phoca Gallery
  • ImageShack
  • Picasa
  • Flickr

So if you want to make your images more appealing and interesting, this course will show you how to do that.
title: Create Stunning Website Slideshows with JSN Imageshow
